name: ★ Eᴍᴏᴊɪ Dᴀꜱʜ ★
description:
★ Eᴍᴏᴊɪ Dᴀꜱʜ ★ 

A game by » M2030 Games « 

By @madrid2030 

================================= 

Hello there young Emoji! What's happening in the Emoji World...? Use your advanced skills to remove all Evil Emojis and collect the diamonts they stole you! 

================================= 

★ Instructions ★ 

● Move with arrows keys, wasd or mobile friendly! 

● Avoid Evil Emojis 

● Collect Diamonts 

● Coment your score!

 ================================= 

★ Credits ★

 ● Code: 100% by @madrid2030 

● Art: 70% by @madrid2030 

● Emojis: 100% by my keyboard XD ● 

● Songs: Intro - Time Hans Zimmer, Alan Walker Remix and Vexento - Masked Heroes
